text: @realDonaldTrump You are NOT God Almighty & definitely NOT a Savior! Can’t handle the pandemic saying it’s great news our coronavirus cases are going up with more testing... those the sites you tried to close down..38 of our 50 states are in trouble & in partial shutdown mode again..deal with it!
